title: CES 2017 - Klipsch RF-7 III Speaker
description:
Abt Electronics talks to Klipsch about their new RF-7 speaker.

The world has come to know Klipsch flagship RF-7 and RC-64 for its quality build, fine materials and staggering acoustics. Updated with new aesthetics and styling, the RF-7 III and RC-64 III take the experience even further. Additionally, each has been fitted with a new high-frequency horn for enhanced detail and smooth sound. Premium furniture-grade wood veneer adorns these masterpieces, proudly hand-made in the USA by craftsmen in Hope, AR - where we have been creating legendary loudspeakers for over 70 years.

Learn more at http://www.klipsch.com/ces-2017
